author: dwayne
title: DAO-NET: DAO Deployment Platform
description: There is a lack of frameworks and tools to create and manage a decentralized autonomous organizations in Cardano blockchain.
solution: Create a DAO to develop a secure, open source customizable DAO solution that can be offered as a service to non-technical communities.
experience: An experienced team of Blockchain developers, Plutus pioneers, SPO operators, Community Advisors and Solutions Analysts.
